00025 /***************************************************************************
00026 OgreEventQueue.h  -  
00027     The EventQueue holds InputEvents.
00028     It doesn't create or delete the objects, just stores them.
00029 
00030 -------------------
00031 begin                : Nov 19 2002
00032 copyright            : (C) 2002 by Kenny Sabir
00033 email                : kenny@sparksuit.com
00034 ***************************************************************************/
00035 
00036 #ifndef __EVENT_QUEUE_H__
00037 #define __EVENT_QUEUE_H__
00038 
00039 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00040 
00041 namespace Ogre {
00042 
00044     class _OgreExport EventQueue
00045     {
00046     protected:
00047         std::queue<InputEvent*> mEventQueue;
00048         bool mActivateEventQueue;
00049 
00050     public:
00051         EventQueue();
00052         virtual ~EventQueue();
00053         void push(InputEvent* e);
00054         InputEvent* pop();
00055 
00056 
00060         void activateEventQueue(bool set);
00061 
00062         /* Adrian Cearnau - modified the return type from int to size_t and made the method const. */
00063         size_t getSize() const;
00064 
00065     };
00066 
00067 
00068 
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 #endif //__EVENT_QUEUE_H__
